name: Python!
description:
An Educational Project! Remember that snake game that ran on those old Nokias? Well I recreated it as a console application, using nothing more that pure python! All the source code is available and free to download and mess around with (I highly recommend you to do so). I called the project python! because its a snake, written in python... ;)

(If the game feels too slow, feel free to make the console window smaller! But if the food or part of the snake happens to fall outside the window while you're resizing it, the game will crash)
